name: ᴅᴜʟʟᴀʜ-xᴍᴅ v²
description: This BOT was developed by dullah.

AUTO_READ_STATUS.description: Your contact status will be read automatically(type yes to active or no to deactive ; don't write in capital letter)

DULLAH_CHATBOT.description: Enter yes for your bot to audio chat to messages when offline

CHATBOT.description: Enter yes for your bot to auto reply message when offline

AUTO_REACT.description: Enter yes for your bot to auto react

ANTICALL.description: Enter yes for your bot to auto reject calls

AUTO_BIO.description: Enter yes for your bot to auto bio

AUTO_READ.description: Your contact will read messages automatically (yes/no)

AUTO_REACT_STATUS.description: Enter yes for your bot to auto react status

AUDIO_REPLY.description: Enter yes for your bot to audio reply

BLOCK_ALL.description: Turn this 'on' if you want the bot to automatically block anyone who sends a message

AUTO_DOWNLOAD_STATUS.description: Your contact status will be downloaded automatically (yes/no)

PM_PERMIT.description: Other users can't use your bot in pm (yes/no)

BOT_NAME.description: Set a name for your bot

BOT_MENU_LINKS.description: Add one or many links for your bot menu; eg: url1,url2,url3

PUBLIC_MODE.description: Type yes to put your bot on public mode or no for private mode

SESSION_ID.description: Put your session ID, the code received after scanning QR code

NUMERO_OWNER.description: Your number, don't put '+' and include area code

WARN_COUNT.description: Limit of warnings for warning commands

ANTIDELETE1.description: Enable anti delete messages to inbox (yes/no)

AUTO_STICKER.description: Enable auto sticker reply from local assets (yes/no)
